G

getApexX() - Static method in class basketball.Ball
The getter method for the initial y position of the ball
getApexY() - Static method in class basketball.Ball
The getter method for the initial y position of the ball
getBallImage() - Method in class basketball.Ball
The getter method for the ball image, used in "GUI.java" for drawing and setting the positions of the ball.
getBeingShot() - Static method in class basketball.Ball
The getter method for whether the ball is currently in motion or not.
getDone() - Static method in class basketball.Ball
The getter method for the boolean done
getHoopX() - Static method in class basketball.Ball
The getter method for the hoop's x position
getHoopY() - Static method in class basketball.Ball
The getter method for the hoop's y position
getIn() - Static method in class basketball.Ball
The getter method for whether the ball has entered the hoop or not.
getInitX() - Static method in class basketball.Ball
The getter method for the initial x position of the ball
getInitY() - Static method in class basketball.Ball
The getter method for the initial y position of the ball
getIsShooting() - Method in class basketball.Player
This method returns the number code of the Player who is shooting the ball at that time.
getNumber() - Method in class basketball.Player
Returns the number code of player (Player 1 or Player 2) in the game, used as a helper method for testing purposes.
getPlayerImage() - Method in class basketball.Player
This is the getter method for the player's image.
getScore() - Method in class basketball.Player
This is the getter method for the score of the game.
getScored() - Static method in class basketball.Ball
The getter method for whether the ball has entered the hoop or not.
getShotChance() - Static method in class basketball.Player
This method is a helper method for the ball class that calculates the probability of the shot going into the hoop based on distance to the hoop and distance and opposing player.
getStart() - Static method in class basketball.Ball
The getter method for the initial y position of the ball
getX() - Static method in class basketball.Ball
Returns the x position of the ball at current time.
getX() - Method in class basketball.Player
This is the getter method for the player's x coordinate.
getY() - Static method in class basketball.Ball
Returns the y position of the ball at current time.
getY() - Method in class basketball.Player
This is the getter method for the player's y coordinate.
go() - Method in class basketball.Player
This is the method that adjusts the player's x and y velocities and also continuously checks if the player is in bounds or colliding with another player based on the formula in other helper methods.
